etrs89_to_wgs84¶

pycraf.geospatial.etrs89_to_wgs84(elon, elat)[source] [edit on github]¶

Convert ETSR89 coordinates to GPS/WGS84.

ETRS89 is the European Terrestrial Reference System. (Using a Lambert Equal Area projection.)

Parameters
elon, elatQuantity

ETRS89 longitude and latitude [m]

Returns
glon, glatQuantity

GPS/WGS84 longitude and latitude [deg]
